name: webpack
description: A module bundler for JavaScript applications. It takes modules with dependencies and generates static assets representing those modules.

name: parcel
description: A zero-configuration web application bundler that aims to provide a faster and easier development experience.

name: gulp
description: A toolkit for automating time-consuming tasks in your development workflow. It uses code-over-configuration with streams and plugins.

name: vite
description: A modern build tool that provides a fast development environment and optimized build process, leveraging native ES modules.

name: rollup
description: A module bundler for JavaScript that compiles small pieces of code into something larger and more complex, such as a library or application.

name: esbuild
description: An extremely fast JavaScript bundler and minifier, written in Go, which focuses on speed and performance.

name: snowpack
description: A modern frontend build tool designed for speed and simplicity, optimized for working with JavaScript modules and fast refresh.

name: broccoli
description: A JavaScript build tool for managing asset pipelines, especially for large JavaScript applications.

name: brunch
description: A build tool for front-end development that supports multiple templates and preprocessing languages with minimal configuration.
